$id

$id: string

Overrides IHasId.$id

  • Defined in json_out/moves/IMove.ts:12
example

"Starforged/Moves/Adventure/Face_Danger"

pattern

^(Starforged|Ironsworn)/Moves/([A-z_-]+|Assets/[A-z_-]+/[A-z_-]+/Abilities/[1-3])/[A-z_-]+$

Optional Asset

Asset?: string
  • Defined in json_out/moves/IMove.ts:20

The ID of the parent Asset of the move, if any.

Category

Category: string
  • Defined in json_out/moves/IMove.ts:25

The ID of the move's category.

example

"Starforged/Moves/Adventure"

Optional

Optional: boolean

Inherited from IHasOptional.Optional

  • Defined in json_out/meta/IHas.ts:198

Whether or not the source material presents this rules item as optional.

default

false

Optional Oracles

Oracles?: string[]
  • Defined in json_out/moves/IMove.ts:41

The IDs of any oracles directly referenced by the move, or vice versa.

Optional Outcomes

Outcomes?: IMoveOutcomes
  • Defined in json_out/moves/IMove.ts:45

Outcome information for the move.

Optional Progress Move

Progress Move?: boolean
  • Defined in json_out/moves/IMove.ts:29

Whether or not the move is a Progress Move. Progress moves roll two challenge dice against a progress score.

Source

Source: ISource

Inherited from IHasSource.Source

  • Defined in json_out/meta/IHas.ts:47

Information on this item's source.

Optional Suggestions

Suggestions?: ISuggestions

Inherited from Partial.Suggestions

  • Defined in json_out/meta/IHas.ts:106

"Non-canonical" suggestions of related items. They might be convenient to present to the user, but in most implementations rolling them automatically is not recommended.

Optional Tags

Tags?: string[]
  • Defined in json_out/moves/IMove.ts:47

Text

Text: string

Inherited from IHasText.Text

  • Defined in json_out/meta/IHas.ts:95

The item's rules text as a markdown string.

markdown

Trigger

Trigger: IMoveTrigger
  • Defined in json_out/moves/IMove.ts:37

The move's trigger data.

Optional Variant of

Variant of?: string
  • Defined in json_out/moves/IMove.ts:33

The ID of the move that this move is a variant of, if any.
